title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Skills: ICT Education Competency Development for Pre-Service Elementary Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explore three or more ICT tools suitable for language instruction design and propose practical implementation strategies.

Learners can share ≥3 ICT utilization cases with peer teachers on online platforms (e.g., Google Classroom, Moodle) and provide specific feedback (≥2 cases) including ≥1 improvement suggestion per case.
Learners experience the process of ICT-based instruction design → implementation → reflection through an inquiry-based learning model.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
